Name: Teddy Bear
Ingredients: 45 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Light (low in alcohol) and tad on the sweet side, apple and pear with a hint of cinnamon spice.
History: Created in 2002 at The Borough, Edinburgh, Scotland. Originally named after a well-known cockney duo but renamed after the cockney rhyming slang for pear.
